"We Are The World"  - we all loved and sang along to it, and still do. The behind the scenes documentary on Netflix is simply good for the soul. It made me cry, smile, laugh and sing. The gift that keeps on giving.🌍♥️
回复 @disco2021 Hope you both are enjoying your day in Dublin. That's a lovely picture of the two of you together. (and the colorful umbrellas above your heads) Keep smiling!😊💟

After battling breast and thyroid cancer the past year, recently had another scare...   Biopsy results earlier today showed no carcinoma; no cancer!!   I look a mess right now, but this is a face of relief and profound gratefulness. https://t.co/tLIhCUuHeq
回复 @walleyed_pike Thank you forever friend, your words always touch my heart. God bless you too.🙏🏼
回复 @MattressMack having a mammogram and ultrasounds in the morning, testing to see if breast cancer has returned. Afterwards, if y'all need volunteers to come help out please let me know. I always enjoy helping out at your store.  God bless you.
回复 @TommyD6336 It sure did, heat index has been above 100° in Houston already. Imagine how August will be...hot hot hot
Meeting with breast surgeon for a follow up visit. This should be an easy appointment, hopefully.   Hope all of you are healthy and happy, love y'all.🌹🩵
I would never think a man covered in tattoos who goes by the name Crooks could get me to feel bad for him.  Ugh.😔 - he lost his Dad in a car accident when he was a kid, started doing meth at age 8. Each piece of our puzzles form us, good and bad.   Count your blessings.  I am.
No biopsy needed, so no cancer. It was basically just healing still taking place after the other cancer and surgery.  Happy early birthday to me! 💝🎗️😊
Day 2 radiation time.✌🏼
回复 @kurt13warner Unfortunately, there has been a huge divide due to all the political drama. Both sides push intolerance and hate for the other side, which only deepens our divide. It's up to us to bring back respectfully discussing different opinions. Be kind to others and ourselves too. 🙏🏼🇺🇸
15 Radiation Treatments done, 10 to go.  My breast looks like it has a bad sunburn, and feels very warm. I have an aloe vera plant, use that and lotion to help.  Hanging in there, and thankful for every single day.  Enjoy your weekend!  The weather is beautiful here in Houston.😊
回复 @ofcrdeonjoseph Your videos are great, have shared them with nephew to help him understand what's at stake; and he has changed his mind on how he is voting.  So thank you for helping out some of us in Texas.  (but go Astros!!!)  ((brother is a Dodgers fan))
Our song:  https://t.co/qgkdqnsg2m  He sang this to me right before his last surgery (had a 30% chance to live through it) he was prepped to go, he asked me to hold his hands and started singing. Everyone there cried.  https://t.co/qh0R2toyJ1 He died two months later.  Miss him.
回复 @TommyD6336 The Savannah Bananas!! They are so much fun.🍌😊 The next time they're in Texas you should take your family. Guaranteed to have lots of smiles and laughter.
回复 @charlieLdavis - have a feeling we will see you on another season. Your gut instinct will guide you and we will cheer you on again. Learn lessons from this season and carry them with you. All the best to you.😊
回复 @PapaCorms @ScottBaio John, if you message which theater you go to, I'll buy some tickets for you and a few others to go see Scott's movie. Sincere offer - because its message will be powerful.  He is a good man with a lovely family... maybe open your heart and simply be kind.
回复 @5289davhas Such lovely smiles. You have a beautiful family.😊
回复 @ClickTony I miss my sweet Korkie too, she's been gone almost 10 years. So grateful to have Mini now... - hey, maybe  Maggie Mae and Korkie are running through amazing heavenly fields together.  We'll see them again... Big hugs to you friend.💌
Waiting to have a MRI of brain due to vision and balance issues. It's only April and I am already at 100% with insurance. Breast cancer treatments were most of it  - thyroid cancer and cancer in some lymph nodes will be removed May 3rd.  And now testing brain.😔 Need prayers pls.
回复 @KathleenWinche3 He was the first person I voted for to be President! He had all his charts, so good. Sister and I voted for him, parents for Bush. They tried to change our minds, but we were both so proud to give him our votes! He was a good man. Thanks for the memory.😊
My youngest nephew is very protective of me, he tells it like it is, haha.  He is now 10. (was 5 here)  Just watching some memories this morning, good for the heart.❤️ https://t.co/6juNOd4Xhg
